entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
